title: I will Build Your MLOps & ML Pipelines
description:
I will help you streamline your Machine Learning workflows with robust MLOps solutions and high-performance ML pipelines. As an AI Engineering student (6th Semester) specializing in Python, Blockchain, and MLOps technologies, I bring a unique blend of practical experience and technical expertise. I focus on delivering tangible results, leveraging proven frameworks like FastAPI, MLflow, and Docker to optimize your ML projects.

Here's what you get:

*   **Custom MLOps Pipelines:** I’ll design and implement fully automated pipelines for training, deploying, and monitoring your models, drastically reducing your operational overhead. This includes integrating MLflow for experiment tracking and Docker for reproducible environments.
*   **High-Performance ML Solutions:**  I’ve demonstrated expertise in achieving significant performance gains. For example, my basepy-sdk delivered a 40% performance improvement over Web3.py for interacting with the Base L2 blockchain.  I also developed a purchasing power prediction model with 87% accuracy and automated retraining, constantly improving results.
*   **Scalable & Reliable Deployments:** I utilize modern cloud platforms like Supabase for rapid prototyping and scalable deployments, enabling you to serve up to 90,000 customers in the Pakistani SME market through my WhatsApp AI Chatbot.

**Packages:**

*   **Basic:**  I’ll build a simple MLOps pipeline with basic monitoring and deployment. (Price: $20, 3 days, 1 revision)
*   **Standard:** A more comprehensive pipeline with automated retraining, detailed documentation, and enhanced monitoring. (Price: $65, 7 days, 2 revisions)
*   **Premium:**  A fully customized solution including advanced features like integration with your existing infrastructure, comprehensive testing, and ongoing support. (Price: $130, 14 days, 3 revisions)
requirements: Clearly defined problem statement and data requirements
Access to relevant data sources and APIs
Feedback and approvals throughout the development process

faq.q: What kind of models can you work with?
faq.a: I specialize in tabular data models utilizing algorithms like XGBoost and Scikit-Learn, but I'm adaptable and willing to explore other approaches based on your project needs.

faq.q: What deployment options do you support?
faq.a: I primarily deploy to cloud platforms like Supabase and Railway, leveraging Docker containers for portability and scalability.

basic.title: Basic
basic.description: Includes a basic MLOps pipeline with core functionality and simple monitoring. This package covers the foundational steps: data preparation, model training (using XGBoost), and basic deployment to a local environment via Docker. Includes one revision for minor adjustments.

standard.title: Standard
standard.description: This package provides a more robust and fully-featured MLOps pipeline, including automated retraining, comprehensive documentation, and enhanced monitoring. We'll implement MLflow for experiment tracking, Docker for reproducible environments, and a CI/CD pipeline for automated deployments. Includes two revisions for addressing specific feedback and refinements.

premium.title: Premium
premium.description: The premium package offers a fully customized MLOps solution tailored to your specific needs, integrating seamlessly with your existing infrastructure. This includes advanced features like data validation, A/B testing, and dedicated support.  We’ll implement thorough testing, comprehensive documentation, and ongoing monitoring. Includes three revisions for detailed feedback incorporation and quality assurance.
